full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement - F1571-220570

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3707775594-Doc3712541811
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3707775594
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-18
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-02 14:00:00 (Note: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. You must submit your bid and all required supporting documentation by 17:00 ET on November 1, 2022)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-11-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-03-31

### Tender Information

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit a bid for the repair of Wharf 401, 402, and the east section of Wharf 404 in Port Edward, BC. The successful contractor will be required to provide equipment, labour, and materials for the repairs, with completion expected by March 15, 2023.

### Tendering Process

This is a two-phase competition, with the first phase evaluating the qualifications of all bidders. The second phase will invite qualified bidders to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings. The pre-qualification list will expire after the award of a contract in phase two and will not be used in any other solicitation.

### Important Details

* All bids submitted after 17:00 ET on November 1, 2022, will be declared non-responsive.
* Please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting for additional information and instructions.

### Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:
Summer Wong
Email: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Note: No phone or fax number is provided.
